definition: ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
lit. intense fire to dry wood (idiom); inferno in a woodpile/fig. consuming passion between lovers
the storm put strong grass to the test, fire tests true gold (idiom); fig. troubled times test a faithful minister/to show one's true colors after a stern test
pinyin: ji2 feng1 zhi1 jin4 cao3 , lie4 huo3 jian4 zhen1 jin1
containing_words.word: 疾風知勁草，烈火見真金

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold, adversity of strong man .
sentences.chinese: 烈火試真金，逆境煉壯士。

sentences.english: It's the true test of its stuff.
sentences.chinese: 它是對烈火對真金的考驗。

sentences.english: True gold is smelt well in a blazing fire; courage is trained in difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 真金在烈火中練就，勇氣在困難中培養。

sentences.english: Better a little fire to warm us, than a at one to burn us.
sentences.chinese: 適量的火好取暖，熊熊烈火能焚身。

sentences.english: Fire Thunder to play a maximum power of catching up after school kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 發揮上限的烈火雷霆學了後威力趕超菜刀。

sentences.english: as fire tries gold, so does adversity try virtue.
sentences.chinese: 正如烈火試煉真金，逆境試煉人的美德。

sentences.english: Of the fire you have had to bear.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你曾受烈火的鍛鍊。

sentences.english: Bring me my chariot of fire!
And whoso falleth not down and worshippeth, that he should be cast into the midst of a burning fiery furnace.
sentences.chinese: 凡不俯伏敬拜的，必扔在烈火的窯中。

sentences.english: In what distant deeps or skies Burnt the fire of 3)thine eyes?
sentences.chinese: 你眼中的烈火熊熊來自多遠的深處或高空？

sentences.english: It is the second time India has test-fired the Agni-three missile.
sentences.chinese: 這是印度第二次試射烈火三型遠程導彈。

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold, adversity of friendship.
sentences.chinese: 烈火試真金，苦難試友情。

sentences.english: And whoso falleth not down and worshippeth shall the same hour be cast into the midst of a burning fiery furnace.
sentences.chinese: 凡不俯伏敬拜的，必立時扔在烈火的窯中。

sentences.english: All China is littered with dry faggots which will soon be aflame.
sentences.chinese: 中國是全國都佈滿了乾柴，很快就會燃成烈火。

sentences.english: It was a dissolving fire which was actuating him now.
sentences.chinese: 此刻驅使他的是吞噬一切的烈火。

sentences.english: A late moth blustered in to find the fire .
sentences.chinese: 一隻遲棲的飛蛾，拼命撲向烈火。
